nodes.text: Dromund brandy was a type of brandy that was produced in the Dromund system during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire. It was a favorite drink of Vowrawn, a Sith Lord on the Empire's ruling Dark Council.
Dromund brandy was first mentioned in entry for Darth Vowrawn in the 2012 reference guide Star Wars: The Old Republic Encyclopedia.
